greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Sum_{k=1..n} mu(k)*k, where mu(k) is the Moebius function.
comment: Equals row sums of triangle A143158. - _Gary W. Adamson_, Jul 27 2008
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
maple: a:= proc(n) a(n):= mobius(n)*n +a(n-1) end: a(0):=0:
results.author: _Leroy Quet_, Feb 27 2002
